rules.name: GitHub CLI Automation
rules.description: Use the GitHub CLI (gh) to automate pull request and issue management for this project.
prompts: Create a pull request for the current branch using gh pr create, with a descriptive title and body.
Comment on a GitHub issue using gh issue comment <number> --body '<comment>' to update stakeholders.
Close an issue with gh issue close <number> --comment '<reason>' after merging a PR.
List open pull requests with gh pr list.
Check PR status with gh pr status.
Merge a pull request using gh pr merge <number> --merge.
Assign reviewers to a PR with gh pr edit <number> --add-reviewer <username>.
View issue details with gh issue view <number>.
Reopen an issue with gh issue reopen <number>.
Label an issue or PR with gh issue edit <number> --add-label <label>.
